scripts.turbopack: cd frontend && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 npx next build --turbopack
scripts.build:all: npm run format && concurrently "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:frontend" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.docker:up:no-strict: REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml --profile local up --build
scripts.docker:up:no-strict:detached: REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml --profile local up --build -d
scripts.docker:ssg:up:no-strict: REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml --profile local-ssg up --build
scripts.docker:ssg:up:no-strict:detached: REACT_STRICT_MODE=false docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml --profile local-ssg up --build -d
scripts.docker:build:backend: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${REQUIRED_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_BACKEND:?}"; : "${MONGODB_URI:?}"; : "${PAYLOAD_SECRET:?}"; : "${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID:?}"; : "${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY:?}"; : "${SES_FROM_EMAIL:?}"; : "${SES_TO_EMAIL:?}"; : "${FRONTEND_URL:?}"; : "${PUBLIC_SERVER_URL:?}"; : "${S3_BUCKET:?}"; : "${AWS_REGION:?}"; : "${BACKEND_INTERNAL_URL:?}"; : "${PUBLIC_PROJECTS_BUCKET:?}"; : "${NDA_PROJECTS_BUCKET:?}"; printf %s "$REQUIRED_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_BACKEND" > /tmp/required_environment_variables_backend; printf %s "$MONGODB_URI" > /tmp/mongodb_uri; printf %s "$PAYLOAD_SECRET" > /tmp/payload_secret; printf %s "$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID" > /tmp/aws_access_key_id; printf %s "$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY" > /tmp/aws_secret_access_key; printf %s "$SES_FROM_EMAIL" > /tmp/ses_from_email; printf %s "$SES_TO_EMAIL" > /tmp/ses_to_email; printf %s "${SMTP_FROM_EMAIL:-}" > /tmp/smtp_from_email; printf %s "$FRONTEND_URL" > /tmp/frontend_url; printf %s "$PUBLIC_SERVER_URL" > /tmp/public_server_url; printf %s "$S3_BUCKET" > /tmp/s3_bucket; printf %s "$AWS_REGION" > /tmp/aws_region; printf %s "$BACKEND_INTERNAL_URL" > /tmp/backend_internal_url; printf %s "$PUBLIC_PROJECTS_BUCKET" > /tmp/public_projects_bucket; printf %s "$NDA_PROJECTS_BUCKET" > /tmp/nda_projects_bucket; DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --target runtime --build-arg BUILD_ENV_PROFILE=dev --build-arg REQUIRED_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_BACKEND="$REQUIRED_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_BACKEND" --secret id=mongodb_uri,src=/tmp/mongodb_uri --secret id=payload_secret,src=/tmp/payload_secret --secret id=aws_access_key_id,src=/tmp/aws_access_key_id --secret id=aws_secret_access_key,src=/tmp/aws_secret_access_key --secret id=ses_from_email,src=/tmp/ses_from_email --secret id=ses_to_email,src=/tmp/ses_to_email --secret id=smtp_from_email,src=/tmp/smtp_from_email --secret id=public_server_url,src=/tmp/public_server_url --secret id=frontend_url,src=/tmp/frontend_url --secret id=s3_bucket,src=/tmp/s3_bucket --secret id=public_projects_bucket,src=/tmp/public_projects_bucket --secret id=nda_projects_bucket,src=/tmp/nda_projects_bucket --secret id=aws_region,src=/tmp/aws_region --secret id=backend_internal_url,src=/tmp/backend_internal_url -t bhbaysinger/bb-portfolio-backend:dev ./backend; rm -f /tmp/required_environment_variables_backend /tmp/mongodb_uri /tmp/payload_secret /tmp/aws_access_key_id /tmp/aws_secret_access_key /tmp/ses_from_email /tmp/ses_to_email /tmp/smtp_from_email /tmp/public_server_url /tmp/frontend_url /tmp/s3_bucket /tmp/public_projects_bucket /tmp/nda_projects_bucket /tmp/aws_region /tmp/backend_internal_url'
scripts.docker:build:frontend: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${REQUIRED_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_FRONTEND:?}"; : "${NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV_PROFILE:?}"; : "${BACKEND_INTERNAL_URL:?}"; : "${PUBLIC_PROJECTS_BUCKET:?}"; : "${NDA_PROJECTS_BUCKET:?}"; : "${NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_APP_MONITOR_ID:?}"; : "${NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_IDENTITY_POOL_ID:?}"; : "${NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_GUEST_ROLE_ARN:?}"; : "${NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_REGION:?}"; : "${NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_DEBUG:?}"; printf %s "$REQUIRED_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES_FRONTEND" > /tmp/required_environment_variables_frontend; printf %s "$NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV_PROFILE" > /tmp/next_public_env_profile; printf %s "$BACKEND_INTERNAL_URL" > /tmp/backend_internal_url; printf %s "$PUBLIC_PROJECTS_BUCKET" > /tmp/public_projects_bucket; printf %s "$NDA_PROJECTS_BUCKET" > /tmp/nda_projects_bucket; printf %s "$NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_APP_MONITOR_ID" > /tmp/next_public_rum_app_monitor_id; printf %s "$NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_IDENTITY_POOL_ID" > /tmp/next_public_rum_identity_pool_id; printf %s "$NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_GUEST_ROLE_ARN" > /tmp/next_public_rum_guest_role_arn; printf %s "$NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_REGION" > /tmp/next_public_rum_region; printf %s "$NEXT_PUBLIC_RUM_DEBUG" > /tmp/next_public_rum_debug; DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --target runner --build-arg ENV_PROFILE=dev --secret id=required_environment_variables_frontend,src=/tmp/required_environment_variables_frontend --secret id=next_public_env_profile,src=/tmp/next_public_env_profile --secret id=backend_internal_url,src=/tmp/backend_internal_url --secret id=public_projects_bucket,src=/tmp/public_projects_bucket --secret id=nda_projects_bucket,src=/tmp/nda_projects_bucket --secret id=next_public_rum_app_monitor_id,src=/tmp/next_public_rum_app_monitor_id --secret id=next_public_rum_identity_pool_id,src=/tmp/next_public_rum_identity_pool_id --secret id=next_public_rum_guest_role_arn,src=/tmp/next_public_rum_guest_role_arn --secret id=next_public_rum_region,src=/tmp/next_public_rum_region --secret id=next_public_rum_debug,src=/tmp/next_public_rum_debug -t bhbaysinger/bb-portfolio-frontend:dev ./frontend; rm -f /tmp/required_environment_variables_frontend /tmp/next_public_env_profile /tmp/backend_internal_url /tmp/public_projects_bucket /tmp/nda_projects_bucket /tmp/next_public_rum_app_monitor_id /tmp/next_public_rum_identity_pool_id /tmp/next_public_rum_guest_role_arn /tmp/next_public_rum_region /tmp/next_public_rum_debug'
scripts.caddy:down:force: docker rm -f bb-portfolio-backend-local bb-portfolio-frontend-local bb-portfolio-caddy-local || true
scripts.caddy:config:validate: COMPOSE_PROFILES=local,proxy docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml exec -T caddy-local caddy validate --config /etc/caddy/Caddyfile --adapter caddyfile
scripts.caddy:config:reload: COMPOSE_PROFILES=local,proxy docker compose -f deploy/compose/docker-compose.yml exec -T caddy-local caddy reload --config /etc/caddy/Caddyfile --adapter caddyfile
scripts.caddy:config:apply: npm run caddy:config:validate && npm run caddy:config:reload
scripts.frontend:purge: docker exec -t bb-portfolio-frontend-local sh -lc 'rm -rf .next && echo Purged .next'
scripts.bareMetalDev:tabs: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd \"$(pwd)/backend\" && npm run dev"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd \"$(pwd)/frontend\" && npm run dev"'
scripts.audit:fix:all: concurrently "npm audit fix" "cd backend && npm audit fix" "cd frontend && npm audit fix" --names "root,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm install" "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install" --names "root,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "yellow,blue,green"
scripts.migrate:all:dev:dry: npm run migrate:media:dev && npm run migrate:media-urls:dev:dry
scripts.migrate:all:dev: npm run migrate:media:dev && npm run migrate:media-urls:dev
scripts.migrate:all:prod:dry: npm run migrate:media:prod && npm run migrate:media-urls:prod:dry
scripts.migrate:all:prod: npm run migrate:media:prod && npm run migrate:media-urls:prod
scripts.db:rename:local:portfolio-to-bb: bash scripts/migrate-database.sh local local --source-db portfolio-local --target-db bb-portfolio-local
scripts.db:rename:local:portfolio-to-bb:dry: bash scripts/migrate-database.sh local local --source-db portfolio-local --target-db bb-portfolio-local --dry-run
scripts.db:rename:dev:portfolio-to-bb: bash scripts/migrate-database.sh dev dev --source-db portfolio-dev --target-db bb-portfolio-dev
scripts.db:rename:dev:portfolio-to-bb:dry: bash scripts/migrate-database.sh dev dev --source-db portfolio-dev --target-db bb-portfolio-dev --dry-run
scripts.db:rename:prod:portfolio-to-bb: bash scripts/migrate-database.sh prod prod --source-db portfolio-prod --target-db bb-portfolio-prod
scripts.db:rename:prod:portfolio-to-bb:dry: bash scripts/migrate-database.sh prod prod --source-db portfolio-prod --target-db bb-portfolio-prod --dry-run
scripts.db:migrate:local-to-both: npm run db:migrate:local-to-prod && npm run db:migrate:local-to-dev
